full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/26/2023 Page 1 of 2 AFFIDAVIT FOIA(b)(6) I Paramjit Singh Walia, son of Mr. Kartar Singh Walia, along with FOIA (b) (6) FOIA (b)(6) California, do hereby solemnly declare as follows: 1. That, we will financially support my uncle Mr. Jagdev Singh Judge and my aunt Mrs. Charanjit Kaur Judge on their arrival in the U.S.A. We will take full responsibility for all of their expenses including but not limited to living, medical and travel etc. 2. FOIA (b)(6) 3. That, my annual income from my employment as a Senior Engineering Executive at Northrop Corporation is in excess of $80,000, and my projected income from consulting work is in excess of $30,000; and that FOIA b)(6) FOIA (b) (6) . 4. That, we have saved money in the form of stocks fully vested in our names, present value in excess of $25,000. We have also saved money in several banks in savings accounts to the amount in excess of $50,000. 5. FOIA (b)(6) 6. That, We will be willing to deposit a bond, if necessary, with the Immigration and Naturalization Service to guarantee that my uncle and aunt will not become a public charge in the U.S.A. 7. That; I am a U.S. citizen by naturalization, I was naturalized on May 20, 1985 at the U.S. District Court. Los Angeles, Calif. , mv naturalization number is 12123900: that FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b) (6)
